SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into actallot (actid, actname, studentid, sysuserid, sysusername, acttype, createTime, callTime, callStatus, actCreater, remark) values (#{actid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{calltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{callstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actcreater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update actallot set actid = #{actid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actname = #{actname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studentid = #{studentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sysuserid = #{sysuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sysusername = #{sysusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acttype = #{acttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, callTime = #{calltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, callStatus = #{callstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actCreater = #{actcreater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, actid, actname, studentid, sysuserid, sysusername, acttype, createTime, callTime, callStatus, actCreater, remark from actallot where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
